docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: It is unfortunate that the president of the American Lung Association cannot deal objectively with the so-called ''public smoking'' issue. The arguments presented in his Sept. 13 letter , ''Why Smoking on Airliners Should Be Totally Banned,'' deserve careful scrutiny.
